Table of Contents

Namespace BetfairDotNet.Models.Betting

Classes

CancelExecutionReport

Response to a CancelInstruction.

CancelInstruction

Instruction to fully or partially cancel an order (only applies to LIMIT orders). The CancelInstruction report won't be returned for marketId level cancel instructions.

CancelInstructionReport

The response to a cancelInstructions request.

ClearedOrderSummary

Summary of a cleared order (settled, voided, cancelled etc)

ClearedOrderSummaryReport

A container representing search results.

Competition

The competition associated with an event.

CompetitionResult

The result of a competition.

CountryCodeResult

CountryCode Result

CurrentOrderSummary

Summary of a current order (unmatched etc)

CurrentOrderSummaryReport

A container representing search results.

Event

The event metadata.

EventResult

The result of a completed event.

EventType

The event type.

EventTypeResult

The result associated with an EventType.

ExBestOffersOverrides

Options to alter the default representation of best offer prices.

ExchangePrices

Contains the prices and traded volumes at both exchange and SP for a given selection.

ItemDescription

Contains some text which may be useful to render a betting history view. It offers no long-term warranty as to the correctness of the text.

KeyLineDescription

A list of KeyLineSelection objects describing the key line for the market.

KeyLineSelection

Description of a markets key line selection, comprising the selectionId and handicap of the team it is applied to.

LimitOnCloseOrder

Place a new LIMIT_ON_CLOSE bet

LimitOrder

Place a new LIMIT order (simple exchange bet for immediate execution)

MarketBook

The dynamic data in a market.

MarketCatalogue

Information about a market

MarketDescription

Market definition.

MarketFilter

Filter options for listMaketCatalogue.

MarketLineRangeInfo

Market Line and Range Info

MarketOnCloseOrder

Place a new LIMIT_ON_CLOSE bet.

MarketProfitAndLoss

Profit and loss in a market.

MarketRates

Market rates.

MarketTypeResult

The result associated with a MarketType.

MarketVersion

Version of a market that changes on the turn in-play or suspend.

Match

An individual bet Match, or rollup by price or avg price. Rollup depends on the requested MatchProjection.

Order

An order on the Exchange.

PlaceExecutionReport

The return type for the placeOrders request.

PlaceInstruction

Instruction to place a new order.

PlaceInstructionReport

Response to a PlaceInstruction

PriceLadderDescription

Description of the price ladder type and any related data.

PriceProjection

Selection criteria of the returning price data.

PriceSize

Price and volume.

ReplaceExecutionReport

Response to a replace instruction.

ReplaceInstruction

Instruction to replace a LIMIT or LIMIT_ON_CLOSE order at a new price. Original order will be cancelled and a new order placed at the new price for the remaining stake.

ReplaceInstructionReport

Response for a replace instructions request.

RunnerBook

The dynamic data about runners in a market.

RunnerCatalog

Information about the Runners (selections) in a market.

RunnerId

Contains the unique identifier for a runner.

RunnerProfitAndLoss

Profit and loss if selection is wins or loses.

StartingPrices

Information about the Betfair Starting Price. Only available in BSP markets.

TimeRange

Time range.

TimeRangeResult

The result of an associated TimeRange.

UpdateExecutionReport

Response for a updateOrders request.

UpdateInstruction

Instruction to update LIMIT bet's persistence of an order that do not affect exposure.

UpdateInstructionReport

Response for each UpdateInstruction.

VenueResult

The result associated with a particular venue.
